txt.en: This needle of the Uch-lûth travelled many leagues within the body of the Orc that slew Deilur more than fifty years ago, before it finally meted her justice upon him. The corruption that affixed to the needle in Mordor has been cleansed by returning it to the land that Deilur called home. Elrond has imbued it with the Light of Eärendil, and believes it will help you banish the shadows of Mordor.
